author: rbb
msg: Begin to update apr/lib files to follow the standard APR function format.
This is the incredibly low hanging fruit, where all I am doing is
standardizing the return codes for functions that already returned int's.

author: rbb
msg: Clean up the getopt stuff a bit.  Basically, I am removing the #define's,
and changing the names in the getopt.c file so that we are sure there is
no namespace collision between regular getopt's, and APR's getopt.

author: rbb
msg: With the removal of the signalling logic, this should have gone away too.
We no longer try to compile a test program for functions we don't have.
